reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 475/98: CHANGES TO THE PUBLIC UTILITIES COMMISSION OF THE CITY OF QUINTE WEST
reg_info.reg_name_text: CHANGES TO THE PUBLIC UTILITIES COMMISSION OF THE CITY OF QUINTE WEST
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act   Loi sur les municipalités

content.content: 1. The council of The Corporation of the City of Quinte West may by by-law increase the number of appointed members of the public utilities commission of the City of Quinte West from two members to four. O. Reg. 475/98, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The council of The Corporation of the City of Quinte West may by by-law increase the number of appointed members of the public utilities commission of the City of Quinte West from two members to four. O. Reg. 475/98, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Upon the passing of a by-law under section 1, the public utilities commission of the City of Quinte West shall be composed of the mayor of the city and four persons who are qualified electors in the city under the Municipal Elections Act, 1996 and who are appointed by by-law. O. Reg. 475/98, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Upon the passing of a by-law under section 1, the public utilities commission of the City of Quinte West shall be composed of the mayor of the city and four persons who are qualified electors in the city under the Municipal Elections Act, 1996 and who are appointed by by-law. O. Reg. 475/98, s. 2.

content.content: 3. (1) At the beginning of the term of each newly-elected municipal council after a regular election, the City of Quinte West shall pass a by-law appointing four persons, as described in section 2, to the public utilities commission of the city. (2) The council of the City of Quinte West may pass a by-law appointing a person to replace any member who resigns or is unable to complete his or her term of office. (3) The persons appointed to the public utilities commission by by-law shall hold office until the end of the term of office of the members of the municipal council that appointed them or until their successors are appointed. O. Reg. 475/98, s. 3.
content.raw_html:
3. (1) At the beginning of the term of each newly-elected municipal council after a regular election, the City of Quinte West shall pass a by-law appointing four persons, as described in section 2, to the public utilities commission of the city.

(2) The council of the City of Quinte West may pass a by-law appointing a person to replace any member who resigns or is unable to complete his or her term of office.

(3) The persons appointed to the public utilities commission by by-law shall hold office until the end of the term of office of the members of the municipal council that appointed them or until their successors are appointed. O. Reg. 475/98, s. 3.
